import { useState } from 'react'; import { eyeOpen, togglePasswordVisibility } from '../lib/password-visibility'; const Login = () => { const [svgPath, setSVGPath] = useState(eyeOpen); const [svgCX, setSVGcx] = useState('56.5'); const [lineWidth, setLineWidth] = useState('0'); const [passVis, setPassVis] = useState('password'); const eyeClickHandler = () => togglePasswordVisibility( [passVis, setPassVis], [svgPath, setSVGPath], [svgCX, setSVGcx], [lineWidth, setLineWidth] ); return (
